front.title: IEC 62528 Ed. 1 (IEEE Std 1500(TM)-2005): Standard Testability Method for Embedded Core-based Integrated Circuits

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard defines a mechanism for the test of core designs within a system on chip (SoC). This mechanism constitutes a hardware architecture and leverages the core test language (CTL) to facilitate communication between core designers and core integrators.
